title: Learn JavaScript
description: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript, the most popular programming language for web development.
courseOverview: This course introduces you to JavaScript, a powerful programming language used to add interactivity and functionality to web pages. You'll learn about variables, functions, loops, and more to start building dynamic websites.
willLearn: What JavaScript is and how it works
Working with the Document Object Model (DOM)
prerequisites: Basic understanding of HTML and CSS
Familiarity with using a text editor and browser

sections.title: Introduction to JavaScript
sections.firstMessage:
Welcome to the 'Introduction to JavaScript' section! Here, you'll learn the basics of what JavaScript is and how it integrates with HTML. Lessons include:
1. What is JavaScript?
2. Adding JavaScript to a Web Page
3. Understanding the Browser Console

lessons.title: Adding JavaScript to a Web Page

sections.title: JavaScript Basics
sections.firstMessage:
In this section, we dive into the core basics of JavaScript programming. Lessons include:
1. Variables and Data Types
2. Operators in JavaScript
3. Writing Your First JavaScript Program

sections.title: Control Flow in JavaScript
sections.firstMessage:
This section focuses on controlling the flow of your programs using conditions and loops. Lessons include:
1. If-Else Statements
2. Loops: For, While, and Do-While
3. Switch Statements

sections.title: Functions and Scope
sections.firstMessage:
Learn how to organize your code with functions and understand variable scope. Lessons include:
1. Defining and Calling Functions
2. Function Parameters and Return Values
3. Understanding Variable Scope

sections.title: Working with the DOM
sections.firstMessage:
Discover how to interact with web pages using the Document Object Model (DOM). Lessons include:
1. Introduction to the DOM
2. Selecting and Manipulating Elements
3. Adding Event Listeners

sections.title: Conclusion and Next Steps
sections.firstMessage:
Congratulations on completing the JavaScript Basics course! Let's recap and explore further learning opportunities. Lessons include:
1. Course Recap
2. Advanced JavaScript Topics to Explore
